snippet: The deal is one of the first since the Newtown, Conn., school shooting, an incident that has put pressure on some owners of gun manufacturers and related products to sell their holdings.
abstract: The deal is one of the first since the Newtown, Conn., school shooting, an incident that has put pressure on some owners of gun manufacturers and related products to sell their holdings.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bushnell, Maker of Gun Accessories, Is Sold for $985 Million
